extension.description: Addon for Kodi to launch EmulationStation.[CR]EmulationStation is a cross-platform graphical front-end for emulators with controller navigation.[CR]Install and configure EmulationStation before using this launcher, for instructions and downloads, go to http://emulationstation.org/

Addon de Kodi para iniciar EmulationStation.[CR]EmulationStation es una interfaz gráfica multi-plataforma para emuladores con navegación por medio de controles (mandos).[CR]Instala y configura EmulationStation antes de usar este inicializador, para instrucciones y descargas, visite http://emulationstation.org/

Addon pour lancer EmulationStation à partir de Kodi[CR] EmulationStation est une interface graphique multi-plateforme pour les émulateurs utilisant un controlleur pour la navigation. [CR] Installez et configurez EmulationStation avec d'utiliser ce raccourci, pour des instructions et le lien de téléchargement, consultez http://emulationstation.org/

1.1.7 - Fixed License file to match the GitHub's license auto-detect feature

1.1.3 - Before reenabling powersavings we now send Down key to Kodi to wake it up. Otherwise it will go to sleep when parameter is set.
